content: Posted Sat 28 March 2009 03:43 AM Hide Post They say the stop loss pay will begin in april 1st and later in the year they will back pay to oct. 2008. THAT IS BULL ****. I was stop lossed in 2003 and if anyone else who was stop lossed before oct. 2008 should write thier congressman and complain that this pay doesnt extend to ALL veterans who were involuntarily extended. Maybe if enough people complain we will all get back pay. Besides its a safer investment for the govt than AIG.
